Speaker: speaker2
Response: My parents called . As usual , they reminded me again that I should have a plan to marry by my late 20s . Easier said then done . Who should I marry ? I have no time to go on a date .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: It is not your mother finding one for you ?

Speaker: speaker2
Response: I will find one myself , of course . I ’ m a modern girl .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: Perhaps you can try the three minutes date , the latest type .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: You mean dozens of the opposite sex meet each other for three minutes in a dimly bar serving alcohol , I hate that idea .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: No , there is an updated virgin , three minutes video date . I know an online dating website providing such service with a microphone and webcam , you can sigh for it . You can be face-to-face with a guy talking for maximum three minutes .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: I don ’ t think it makes sense . Three minutes is such a short time .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: I think you can find out if there is a possibility of romance within the first second of meeting someone , so-called love at first sight .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: Anyway , I don ’ t want to post my face up for sale on the internet like that .

Speaker: speaker1
Response: Don ’ t worry . There are many other options using the internet as dating methods . Some sites operate at international standard even have got certifications . Of course , for these sites , you have to pay a membership fee . But all in all , it is more serious and professional . The chance of meeting a good and serious person who does not play games is higher .

Speaker: speaker2
Response: I don ’ t want to post my personal information on the internet . I ’ m not knowing who is reading it .
